361ca128e6d84f2e9519f7007eb2d:
  'name': Update Contact Info
  'skill description': The employee wants to update their contact information while
    on parental leave.
  'entity':
    1b02f81707de425a9ccd7caa08755:
      'name': contact_type
      'description': The type of contact information to be updated.
    7ea22dada70f4f51b6a1d769fa99f:
      'name': new_info
      'description': The new contact information that will replace the old
        one.
      'similar values':
      - johndoe@newemail.com
      - +1-123-456-7890
      - 1234 Example St, City, State, Country

  'name': Request Leave
  'skill description': The employee wants to request parental leave.
  'entity':

      'description': The date the employee intends to start their leave.
    86a0ab118b054d6ba39e9e9058258:
      'name': type_of_leave
      'description': The type of parental leave the employee is requesting.
      'similar values':

      - paternity leave
      - adoption leave
edcf6c6472664a089eb6c61b8a6c9:
  'name': Benefits Coverage

    their parental leave.

418d69fe1dc04815a3c6067c2352a:
